Module com.cs2212.cardbound
Package com.cs2212.cardbound.system

Class MainMenu

java.lang.Object
com.cs2212.cardbound.system.MainMenu
public class MainMenu extends Object
A utility class that manages flags + User related methods for the Main Menu at runtime.
Since:
3/9/2024
Version:
1.0
Author:
Jacob Couture, Pranav Arora

  • Method Details

    • isLoggedIn

      public static boolean isLoggedIn()
      Gets the state of isLoggedIn.
      Returns:
      True if a user is logged in, false otherwise.

    • setLoggedIn

      public static void setLoggedIn(boolean state)
      Sets the state of isLoggedIn
      Parameters:
      state - The new given state.

    • login

      public static boolean login(String username, String password)
      Searches the user database (userData) to see if the login credentials are valid. If valid, sets static variable currentUser to the "logged in" user.
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the user attempting to log in.
      password - The password of the user attempting to log in.
      Returns:
      True if the user successfully logs in, false otherwise.

    • retrieveSettings

      public static void retrieveSettings(User user)
      Retrieves the user settings from the provided User object and updates the corresponding settings in the game.
      Parameters:
      user - The User object from which to retrieve the settings.

    • createUser

      public static void createUser(String username, String password)
      Creates a new user with the provided username and password, adds it to userData (user database), creates a corresponding game save, and saves the game data. Sets the newly created user as the current player.
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the new user.
      password - The password of the new user.

    • getHasSavedGame

      public static boolean getHasSavedGame()
      Gets the state of hasSavedGame.
      Returns:
      True if this user has a saved run, false otherwise.

    • setHasSavedGame

      public static void setHasSavedGame(boolean value)
      Sets hasSavedGame to a new value
      Parameters:
      value - the new given value

    • hasSavedGameProperty

      public static javafx.beans.property.BooleanProperty hasSavedGameProperty()
      Gets the hasSavedGame property
      Returns:
      the hasSavedGame property

    • saveGame

      public static void saveGame()
      Saves the user's game data and settings to JSON files.

      Updates the current user's statistics, volume settings, and gameplay settings, and then writes the user data and game data to JSON files to serve as a functioning database which can retrieve data even after program termination.

    • loadGame

      public static void loadGame()
      Loads the user's saved game data from JSON files (database).

      It reads the user data from SaveData.json and the game data from GameSaveData.json, instantiates the JSON data to corresponding User/GameSave objects, and then holds them as static lists for other methods/procedures to access.

    • startTotalPlaytimeTimer

      public static void startTotalPlaytimeTimer()
      Starts the timer for total playtime

    • deleteSaveGame

      public static void deleteSaveGame()
      Deletes the user's saved game.

    • isDebugActive

      public static boolean isDebugActive()
      Gets the state of debugActive.
      Returns:
      True if debug mode has been activated, false otherwise.

    • setDebugActive

      public static void setDebugActive(boolean state)
      Sets the new state of debugActive
      Parameters:
      state - The new given state.

    • toggleDebugWindow

      public static void toggleDebugWindow(javafx.scene.control.TitledPane debugMenu)
      Called when pressing the exit debug button in the debug menu. Exits debug mode and closes the debug menu.
      Parameters:
      debugMenu - the debug menu to be toggled

    • initDebugMenu

      public static void initDebugMenu(javafx.scene.control.TitledPane debugMenu)
      Initializes the debugMenu in a scene.
      Parameters:
      debugMenu - the given debugMenu
